abstract: Yahoo executives outlined a more sharply defined and plausible strategy for competing with Google.
snippet: Yahoo executives outlined a more sharply defined and plausible strategy for competing with Google.
lead_paragraph: I’ve been a rather harsh critic of Yahoo’s quarterly earnings calls. In January, I called the effort by Jerry Yang and Sue Decker to justify the company’s weak performance a “droning, jargon-filled” explication of a “vision-goes-here strategy.” Two days later, a letter from Redmond arrived with an offer that Yahoo is still working hard to refuse.

headline.main: Yahoo’s Starting Point: A Clearer Strategy

abstract: I.B.M. is entering the market for Internet-focused data centers with computer systems designed to reduce power consumption sharply and take up less floor space.
snippet: I.B.M. is entering the market for Internet-focused data centers with computer systems designed to reduce power consumption sharply and take up less floor space.
lead_paragraph: I.B.M. is entering the market for Internet-focused data centers with computer systems designed to reduce power consumption sharply and take up less floor space.

headline.main: Cloud Computing Gains Steam With New I.B.M. Gear

abstract: Nathan Stoll, a former Google News executive, has been quietly working on a new social search service he started with the help of two other Google refugees, CNET News.com reported.
lead_paragraph: Nathan Stoll, a former Google News executive, has been quietly working on a new social search service he started with the help of two other Google refugees, CNET News.com reported.
